headline: Why Analysts See Duke Energy’s Story Shifting Amid Rising Demand and Market Optimism
summary: Duke Energy's fair value estimate has recently been raised from $133.54 to $137.60, signaling growing optimism among analysts about the company's trajectory. This change is driven by improved growth outlooks and favorable market conditions in addition to rising electricity demand and constructive regulatory support. Stay tuned to find out how investors can track these evolving market perspectives moving forward. What Wall Street Has Been Saying Recent analyst commentary on Duke Energy reveals...

headline: Duke Energy Corporation (DUK) Price Target Raised by $9 at Morgan Stanley
summary: Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) is included among the 12 Best Utility Stocks to Buy for Dividends. Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) engages in the distribution of natural gas and energy-related services. Duke Energy Corporation (NYSE:DUK) received a boost on October 22 when Morgan Stanley analyst David Arcaro raised the stock’s price target from $127 to $136, […]
